definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
lit. to pull apart and knead to a pulp/fig. to analyze minutely from every angle/to chew sth over

definition: to pinch (with one's fingers)/to knead/to make up
to rub or roll between the hands or fingers/to twist
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
temple (on the sides of human head)
to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull
to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
palm (of one's hand)/control (extended meaning from having something in the palm of one's hand)
